question: What virus is the  Gardisil vaccine used for?
ideal_answer: Gardisil is a quadrivalent HPV vaccine would have been useful in the prevention of infections with human papillomavirus.

snippets.text: Gardisil, the quadrivalent HPV vaccine would have been useful in the prevention of 28% (13/46) of these infections
